forward_snippets: Of the total deferred revenue balance as of September 30, 2024, we expect to recognize $ 821 million of revenue in the next 12 months.
Of this amount, we expect to recognize $ 683 million in the next 12 months and the rest over the remaining performance obligation period.
Of this amount, we expect to recognize $ 4.23 billion in the next 12 months and the rest over the remaining performance obligation period.
